<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Read State</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/api/cloud/2.0/agg/notifications/list/state/{notification-id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



### Overview

Get `readState` of the notification whose id specified in the API path parameter.

This is a per-user query.

## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Path Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"notification-profile-id","in":"path","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

OK

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"notifIds"} required={false} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"List of notification IDs","type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"readState"} required={false} schemaName={"NotifReadState (string)"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`READ`, `UNREAD`]"} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Read state of the notification","enum":["READ","UNREAD"],"title":"NotifReadState"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples
